group_1.textLeft: I'll do anything you ask of me.@You know that.
I mean, I live to serve you, after all!

group_1.textRight: (Perhaps I could send you to Kamihama...)

group_1.narration: Though that would be outside my territory.@How could I send her to a strange town@even I know so little about...?
Be that as it may...@Time is not on my side.
Yes... I should make a move @to explore Kamihama as soon@as possible.
Forgive me, Kirika. But know that you will@not have to bear the burden of this mission@alone. I wouldn't do that to you.
I'll keep moving ahead with my plans.@And together...we can save the world@we both know and love!

group_1.textRight: Though I should warn you, this little@errand may take you quite far away...
I heard there's@a famous tea shop there.

group_1.textLeft: Oh!@Well, that's good enough for me!
Then I'm off to Kamihama!@Er... Where's this shop, exactly?

group_1.textRight: I have one other errand for you...
Mami Tomoe and the other Magical Girls@from Mitakihara will also be in Kamihama.
She's the Magical Girl with blonde hair.

group_1.textLeft: So, what?@You want me to kill them?

group_1.textRight: Let's not get ahead of ourselves. Just get@in their way and play with them for a bit.

group_1.textLeft: I mean, I'll do whatever you tell me to.

group_1.textRight: If you take their lives, I'll consider this@errand a failure. Do I make myself clear?

group_1.textLeft: Whoa, whoa, okay!@I mean, yes! [chara:400201:cheek_2]Got it!
I won't kill them, I promise!

group_1.textRight: What I want from them is information.
I want to know why they are in Kamihamaâ€¦

group_1.narration: In the end, sending you to Kamihama,@the place which might have something @to do with [textRed:that girl]...
...is nothing more than a plot@to distract Kyubey.
Mami and Kyoko may still be@of some use to me...@I can't kill them yet.
Which is just as well...@Sending Kirika out to fight the girl who@nearly ended her would be too dangerous.

group_1.textRight: (And I don't need a repeat @of what happened last time...)

group_1.textLeft: I'll take care of it right away!

group_1.textRight: Yes. See to it that you do, Kirika.
